TopicTitle: How to disable animated part self-collisions [0.25]

Articles.Content:
As the title suggests, I have a problem with animated parts colliding with my vessel. Basically, I have an animated part, in this case, an OKS inflatable greenhouse, that is colliding with the vessel it is attached to. As you can imagine, this is causing some problems...

Now, my question is, how do I disable this behavior without going into the editor and replacing the entire ship? Ideally, I'd like to use a MM config but I'm willing to do pretty much anything. I'll even remove the collision mesh from the part, I just need to know how...
